title: AML Gray Zones: When a Safe Transaction Looks Suspicious
quickSteps: Map the full route and purpose of each major transaction before you send anything.
Keep amounts, timing, and counterparties aligned with a simple real-life story you can explain.
Separate personal, business, and experimental flows across wallets, accounts, and tools.
Store lightweight evidence for larger moves (invoices, notes, screenshots) without oversharing.
If a transaction is flagged, respond calmly with a clear explanation and documents instead of improvising.

seo.keywords: AML gray zones,crypto AML false positives,chain analytics heuristics,safe transactions flagged,crypto compliance and privacy
seo.description: A practical guide to AML gray zones in crypto: why safe transactions get flagged, how heuristics work, and how to design routes that are easy to explain.
